definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: smite through, wound severely, shatter (poet.) (As. maḫâṣu, smite, wound, Dl:HWB 398; Ar. maxad.a churn; beat or agitate the milk, etc.; Sab. [[מחַץַ]] DHM:ZXG xxx. 1876, 684; xxxvii. 1883, 338; Burgen u. Schlösser (SB. xcvii. 1881), 965 (of stone-cutter's work), Hom:Chrestom. 127; Eth. mh.s’);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[מ]] Job 26:12 + 3 t.; [[וּמֽחֲחָה]] Ju Jdg 5:26 etc.; Impf. [[יִמְחַץ]] Job 5:18, Ps 68:22; 1 s. sf. [[אֶמְחָחֵם]] Ps 18:39; ´[[וׇא]] 2Sa 22:39; —smite through, sq. [[ראׁשׁוֹ]], of Jael, Ju Jdg 5:26 (‖[[הָלַם]], [[מָחַק]], [[חָלַף]]); of Isr., shattering enemies, ´[[חִצָּיו יִמ]] Nu 24:8 (obj. om.; ‖[[עַחְמׂתֵיהֶם יְגׇרֵם]]) cf. v:Nu 24:17 (obj [[פַּֽאֲתֵי מוֹאָב]]); cf. Ps 18:39 = 2Sa 22:39; of ´[[י]],smiting through or shattering his foes, Ps 110:5; their heads v:Ps 110:6, Ps 68:22, Hb Hab 3:13, loins De 33:l; cf. Job 26:12 obj. [[רַהַב]], q.v.; abs., De 32:39 (opp. [[רָפָא]]; ‖ cl. [[אָמִית וַאֲחַיֶּה]]) cf. Job 5:18 (opp. [[רָפָא]], ‖ cl. [[יַכְאִיב וְיֶחְבָָּשׁ]]). For [[תִּמְחַץ]] [[רגלך בְּדָם]] Ps 68:24, rd. [[תִּרְחַץ]] (Ps 58:11), Ol Br Che Bae We.
